title: Replace first footer image with uploaded signature/branding image

requirements.text: Replace the first of the 4 footer images in the document preview and PDF rendering with the uploaded image '20260228_092922_0002.png' (showing 'Yours faithfully, Dhani Finance LTD.' with signature and 'P Harish Reddy, Chief Executive Officer'). Save this image as a static asset at 'frontend/public/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png' and update both PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts to use this new image as the first footer image instead of the previous one.

quotes: Now change one by one footer 4 image

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image (Dhani Finance LTD. signature block) is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png
PreviewDialog.tsx renders the new image as the first footer image
renderDocumentToCanvas.ts draws the new image as the first footer image in generated PDFs
The other 3 footer images remain unchanged
The first footer image visually displays the 'Yours faithfully, Dhani Finance LTD.' signature block with P Harish Reddy CEO details

constraints: Only the first footer image should be replaced; the remaining 3 footer images must stay the same
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Replacing the 2nd, 3rd, or 4th footer images (those will be handled in separate subsequent requests)
Changes to the document body, header, or any other layout sections
